img.alt: A man touches a digital key to Blum's service world.

span.p: Whether in person or digitally, we offer a wide range of services for cabinet makers, the furniture industry and hardware distributors.
Blum is one of the world’s leading manufacturers of fittings for high-quality kitchens and furniture, for enhanced convenience and a better quality of living.
Good service starts with a good consultation - we are there for you.

span.span: MERIVOBOX
Easy assembly, enormous variety. The box platform for your ideas.
The new ECODRILL: practical assembly device for Blum hinges.
The must-have tool for assembling Blum hinges quickly and precisely in the workshop or on site.
Cabinet doors as entrances
Open up completely new design possibilities with cabinet doors that now also open inwards.
Runner systems by Blum
Quality steel for your wooden design ideas. Discover our product range of runners for wooden drawers.

Lift systems, masterfully staged

Pocket systems for new space concepts

a.p: Lift systems, masterfully staged

a.div: Motion in furniture: hinge systems by Blum
a.p: High-quality technology and a wide variety of products made to an extremely high standard are what set our hinges apart.

a.div: Hinges from Blum: the complete range

a.p: Blum offers three double-walled box systems with a feather-light glide: LEGRABOX, MERIVOBOX and TANDEMBOX fulfil different requirements in furniture design.

a.p: Quality steel for your wooden design ideas. Discover our product range of runners for wooden drawers.
The new product category called pocket systems opens up completely new opportunities for creating multifunctional space

a.div: 4 for more – Motion technologies by Blum
a.p: Each of our four motion technologies can be used individually and each has its own special strengths. Choose the right motion technology and add enhanced convenience and functionality to your furniture.

div.a: The hinge range at a glance

a.p: Lift systems, masterfully staged
The integrated stay lift blends seamlessly into the furniture – for high-quality furniture design.
With AVENTOS HF top, the fitting for bi-fold lift systems, large lift systems with a bi-fold fronts are possible.
With AVENTOS HS top, moving large one-part fronts is a piece of cake.
With the lift up, the one-part front lifts up parallel to the cabinet.
For large and small wall cabinets, offering many integrated features.
Enhanced user convenience for small and light stay lifts.
For small wall cabinets and fitted units.

a.div: Motion in furniture: hinge systems by Blum
a.p: High-quality technology and a wide variety of products made to an extremely high standard are what set our hinges apart.

a.div: Hinges from Blum: the complete range
a.p: Every hinges from Blum for every application in furniture making.
Soft-close BLUMOTION is integrated in the boss.
For proven function and perfect design
Convincing technology and economic efficiency.
Blum offers three double-walled box systems with a feather-light glide: LEGRABOX, MERIVOBOX and TANDEMBOX fulfil different requirements in furniture design.
The elegant box system with slim sides for living areas throughout the home.

img.alt: MERIVOBOX - the new box platform by Blum

a.p: Easy assembly, enormous variety. The box platform for your ideas.
Clear-cut and rectangular
A high-quality system with few component parts.
Quality steel for your wooden design ideas. Discover our product range of runners for wooden drawers.
The sophisticated runner system.
The versatile runner system.
Lock-open stop for TANDEM and MOVENTO pull-out shelves
The new product category called pocket systems opens up completely new opportunities for creating multifunctional space
Organisation at its best – for LEGRABOX and MERIVOBOX
Delivering organisation to TANDEMBOX, MOVENTO and TANDEM.

a.div: 4 for more – Motion technologies by Blum
a.p: Each of our four motion technologies can be used individually and each has its own special strengths. Choose the right motion technology and add enhanced convenience and functionality to your furniture.
For soft and effortless closing.
Wall cabinets, pull-outs and refrigerators open with ultimate ease.
TIP-ON BLUMOTION combines the advantages of the TIP-ON mechanical opening support system with the tried and tested BLUMOTION soft-close system.
The mechanical opening system for doors, lift systems and pull-outs.

a.div: Cabinet applications for more storage space
a.p: Don't waste a single inch: our ideas make it easy to create storage space in places you would never have thought possible.
Use narrow cabinets and don't waste an inch of storage space.
Take storage to new levels: Use the furniture plinth to create extra storage space and provide a step for easy access to higher levels.
This larder unit excels in terms of easy access and ample space for provisions.
Maximise storage capacity around your sink.
Lock-open stop for TANDEM and MOVENTO pull-out shelves
Blum’s locking system adds an extra layer of security to fine furniture.
A simple system with innovative technology at its core
Precise drilling and insertion of fittings.
New digital and automatic tool for MINIPRESS
Well equipped for the future
The easy and fast way to assemble drawers and pull-outs.
Simple and precise transfer of measurements.
Find the right device for every product.

img.alt: A man touches a digital key to Blum's service world.

a.p: Whether in person or digitally, we offer a wide range of services for cabinet makers, the furniture industry and hardware distributors.
Find the right fittings solutions quickly and simply, download the CAD data and order products from your distributor.
Plan cabinets, select fittings and send planning results straight for production.
Plan cabinets, select fittings and send planning results directly to manufacturing.
Descriptions, technical product features, CAD data and other useful information about Blum products.
A service for software partners that delivers time-saving, error-free integration of Blum fittings data.
Cabinet and fittings data can thus be transferred from our configurators to your CAD/CAM software with ultimate ease.
The fast and simple way to access CAD/CAM data
Find the right fittings solutions quickly and simply, download the CAD data and order products from your distributor.
Plan cabinets, select fittings and send planning results straight for production.
Plan cabinets, select fittings and send planning results directly to manufacturing.
Send orders directly to Blum, access logistics data and documents and track status 24/7.
Send complete parts lists from our configurators directly to the online shops of selected distributors.
Send orders directly to Blum, access logistics data and documents and track status 24/7.
We take your individual needs into account and develop flexible bespoke logistical solutions.
Our packaging solutions are customised to fit in optimally with your manufacturing and logistics processes.
Find the right fittings solutions quickly and simply, download the CAD data and order products from your distributor.
Plan cabinets, select fittings and send planning results straight for production.
Plan cabinets, select fittings and send planning results directly to manufacturing.
A service for software partners that delivers time-saving, error-free integration of Blum fittings data.
Cabinet and fittings data can thus be transferred from our configurators to your CAD/CAM software with ultimate ease.
The fast and simple way to access CAD/CAM data
Find the right fittings solutions quickly and simply, download the CAD data and order products from your distributor.
Blum's assembly app answers any questions you may have about the assembly and adjustment of Blum fittings.
Download professional marketing materials such as high-resolution images, videos, brochures and lots more.
Our top quality sales measures will help you create inspiring product displays.
Find the right fittings solutions quickly and simply, download the CAD data and order products from your distributor.
Technical Services is there to help you with Blum products and help wherever in the creative process you are, Manufacturing, Distribution, Retail, Installation or Homeowner...
We have put together a range of training sessions from an overview of our products through to in-depth installation solutions...
Here you can find additional services where we will work with you and our partners to add more value to our products. Commissioning, training and more...
Good services are there when you need them. That is why our services are geared to everyday operations.
Blum is one of the world’s leading manufacturers of fittings for high-quality kitchens and furniture, for enhanced convenience and a better quality of living.
Our innovative products are engineered to last the lifetime of the furniture.
Product quality by Blum ensures that Blum fittings can be assembled and installed with utmost precision.
Blum’s services are top quality and designed to provide our customers with comprehensive support.
We strive to enhance the quality of our products and services by continuously improving our processes.

a.div: Quality Assurance Agreements we trust in
a.p: Our Quality Assurance Agreement is like a gentleman’s agreement.
We will be presenting our products and services at the following trade shows.

There are no restrictions on your design ideas with our fittings solutions.

div.p: Visit our homepage. The latest product innovations and much more are just a few clicks away.

Creating furniture fittings for a better quality of living is one of our main goals. We manufacture lift, hinge, pull-out and pocket systems for furniture and provide complementary services and assembly devices.
